body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Willie Taylor and the customer's name is Dorothy Nelson.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Welcome to Stellar Insurance Services. My name is Alex, and I'm here to assist you today.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alex, nice to meet you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you too! Before we proceed, may I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jamie! Can I also get your email address, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it! And could you provide your phone number as well?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's four zero four, two one two, three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Jamie. How can I assist you further today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I need help understanding my policy options.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely! I can help with that. Thank you for your time today, and if you need anything else, feel free to reach out!
